item.title: CC RDF in JavaScript
item.description: It’s taking much longer than I’d like, but I’m slowly making progress on a new release of mozCC .

item.title: Thoughts on the future of ccLicense.py
item.description: With the Validator up and running, I’ve been thinking more about cclicense.

item.title: Updated ccLicense.py Available

item.title: Why didn’t I think of that sooner?
item.description: Shortly after announcing the validator to the cc-metadata list this morning, I had my first bug report.

item.title: ccLicense.py 0.1
item.description: As part of my effort to complete the Creative Commons web validation service, I inadvertently addressed another of their challenges: creating a language (in this case Python, of course) API for manipulating licenses.
